```{r}
library(ape)
library(mlesky)
set.seed(0)
alphaFun=function(x){if (x<2000 || x>2010) 10 else 1}
sampleDates=seq(1990,2020,0.1)
t=simCoal(sampleDates,alphaFun)
plotBoth(t,alphaFun)
```



```{r}
res=optim_res_aic(t,ncpu = 8)
fit=mlskygrid(t,res=res)
plot(fit)
```

```{r}
res=optim_res_bic(t,ncpu = 8)
fit=mlskygrid(t,res=res)
plot(fit)
```
